body_html: I had a similar issue and was able to fix it by removing the VERBS support from the configure. This is what (I guess) happened: bazel build with the VERBS support actually failed, but I didn't notice it and it still created the file of 'bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package'. And this file gives me the error.

body: I had a similar issue and was able to fix it by removing the VERBS support from the configure. This is what (I guess) happened:  `bazel build` with the VERBS support actually failed, but I didn't notice it and it still created the file of 'bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package'. And this file gives me the error.
